Query the Ensembl REST API

Source: R/analysis_information.R
queryEnsembl.Rd

Query the Ensembl REST API

Usage

queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)

Arguments

path

Character: API path

query

Character: API query

grch37

Boolean: query the Ensembl GRCh37 API? if FALSE, query the most recent API

Value

Parsed response or NULL if no response

Examples

path  <- "overlap/region/human/7:140424943-140624564"
query <- list(feature = "gene")
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)
#>       start external_name       end feature_type              id
#> 1 140419127          BRAF 140624564         gene ENSG00000157764
#> 2 140583872            U6 140583978         gene ENSG00000271932
#>                            logic_name         source canonical_transcript
#> 1 ensembl_havana_gene_homo_sapiens_37 ensembl_havana    ENST00000288602.6
#> 2               ncrna_homo_sapiens_37        ensembl    ENST00000605989.1
#>   version assembly_name
#> 1       8        GRCh37
#> 2       1        GRCh37
#>                                                                   description
#> 1 v-raf murine sarcoma viral oncogene homolog B [Source:HGNC Symbol;Acc:1097]
#> 2                               U6 spliceosomal RNA [Source:RFAM;Acc:RF00026]
#>   strand         gene_id        biotype seq_region_name
#> 1     -1 ENSG00000157764 protein_coding               7
#> 2      1 ENSG00000271932          snRNA               7

path  <- "lookup/symbol/human/BRCA2"
query <- list(expand=1)
psichomics:::queryEnsembl(path, query, grch37 = TRUE)

#> [1] "human"
